content: a cute crochet bandana is not only a fun and easy project to work on but also a fantastic way to show off your personal style whether you re going for a boho-chic vibe or a cottage-core look a crochet bandana is a perfect accessory that will take your outfit to the next level **size** bandana measures 8 5″ tall by 16 5″ wide excluding ties ties measure 14″ each but can be made longer or shorter **gauge** 5 3-double_crochet clusters and 4 5 row = 4″ x 4″ your gauge might be different if you use a different yarn than listed below that s okay measure your triangle as you work and crochet as many row as you need to meet the finished measurements listed above
